typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		current_flag as string,
		data_month as integer,
		npi as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{active flag} as string,
		position as string,
		{healthcare provider primary taxonomy switch} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy code} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy group} as string,
		{provider license number} as string,
		{provider license number state code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StageProviderTaxonomy
source(output(
		code as string,
		grouping as string,
		classification as string,
		specialization as string,
		definition as string,
		notes as string,
		year as integer,
		current_flag as integer,
		{effective date} as string,
		{deactivation date} as string,
		{last modified date} as string,
		{display name} as string,
		{right_effective date} as string,
		{right_deactivation date} as string,
		{right_last modified date} as string,
		{right_display name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NUCCTaxonomy
source(output(
		npi as string,
		data_month as integer,
		{active flag} as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{replacement npi} as string,
		{employer identification number (ein)} as string,
		{provider organization name (legal business name)} as string,
		{provider last name (legal name)} as string,
		{provider first name} as string,
		{provider middle name} as string,
		{provider name prefix text} as string,
		{provider name suffix text} as string,
		{provider credential text} as string,
		{provider other organization name} as string,
		{provider other organization name type code} as string,
		{provider other last name} as string,
		{provider other first name} as string,
		{provider other middle name} as string,
		{provider other name prefix text} as string,
		{provider other name suffix text} as string,
		{provider other credential text} as string,
		{provider other last name type code} as string,
		{provider first line business mailing address} as string,
		{provider second line business mailing address} as string,
		{provider business mailing address city name} as string,
		{provider business mailing address state name} as string,
		{provider business mailing address postal code} as string,
		{provider business mailing address country code (if outside u.s.) } as string,
		{provider business mailing address telephone number} as string,
		{provider business mailing address fax number} as string,
		{provider first line business practice location address} as string,
		{provider second line business practice location address} as string,
		{provider business practice location address city name} as string,
		{provider business practice location address state name} as string,
		{provider business practice location address postal code} as string,
		{provider business practice location address country code out us} as string,
		{provider business practice location address telephone number} as string,
		{provider business practice location address fax number} as string,
		{provider enumeration date} as date,
		{last update date} as date,
		{npi deactivation reason code} as string,
		{npi deactivation date} as date,
		{npi reactivation date} as date,
		{provider gender code} as string,
		{authorized official last name} as string,
		{authorized official first name} as string,
		{authorized official middle name} as string,
		{authorized official title or position} as string,
		{authorized official telephone number} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy code_1} as string,
		{provider license number_1} as string,
		{provider license number state code_1} as string,
		{healthcare provider primary taxonomy switch_1} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy code_2} as string,
		{provider license number_2} as string,
		{provider license number state code_2} as string,
		{healthcare provider primary taxonomy switch_2} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy code_3} as string,
		{provider license number_3} as string,
		{provider license number state code_3} as string,
		{healthcare provider primary taxonomy switch_3} as string,
		{is sole proprietor} as string,
		{is organization subpart} as string,
		{parent organization lbn} as string,
		{parent organization tin} as string,
		{authorized official name prefix text} as string,
		{authorized official name suffix text} as string,
		{authorized official credential text} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy group_1} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy group_2} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy group_3} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NPPESProviderMain
source(output(
		data_month as string,
		npi as string,
		address_line_1 as string,
		address_line_2 as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		postal_code as string,
		corrected_state as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> InputStateCorrection
source(output(
		data_month as string,
		npi as string,
		address_line_1 as string,
		address_line_2 as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		postal_code as string,
		country_code as string,
		corrected_country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> InputCountryCorrection
source(output(
		current_flag as string,
		data_month as integer,
		npi as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{active flag} as string,
		{other provider identifier} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer} as string,
		{other provider identifier state} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StageOtherProvID
Aggregate1, NUCCTaxonomy join({healthcare provider taxonomy code} == code,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTaxonomyCW
JoinTaxonomyCW select(mapColumn(
		current_flag = Aggregate1@current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch = {healthcare provider primary taxonomy switch},
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code = {healthcare provider taxonomy code},
		healthcare_provider_group_taxonomy = {healthcare provider taxonomy group},
		provider_license_number = {provider license number},
		provider_license_number_state_code = {provider license number state code},
		taxonomy_grouping = grouping,
		taxonomy_classification = classification,
		taxonomy_specialization = specialization,
		position
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch=='Y') ~> KeepPrimaryTaxonomy
SortbyNPITaxonomy aggregate(groupBy(npi),
	each(match(name!='npi'), $$ = first($$))) ~> IdentifyPrimaryTaxonomy
KeepPrimaryTaxonomy sort(asc(npi, true),
	asc(position, true)) ~> SortbyNPITaxonomy
Select9, Select3 join(npi == temp_npi,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AppendPrimaryTaxonomy
Select4 derive(current_flag = '1',
		{provider business practice location address state name} = iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='ALASKA','AK',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='ALABAMA','AL',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='ARKANSAS','AR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='AMERICAN SAMOA','AS',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='ARIZONA','AZ',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='CA- CALIFORNIA','CA',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='CALIFORNIA','CA',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='LOS ANGELES','CA',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='COLORADO','CO',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='CONNECTICUT','CT',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA','DC',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='DELAWARE','DE',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='FL - FLORIDA','FL',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='FLA','FL',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='FLORIDA','FL',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='MICRONESIA, FEDERATED STATES OF','FM',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='GEORGIA','GA',

iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='ILLINOIS','IL',

iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='KENTUCKY','KY',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='LOUISIANA','LA',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='NEW ORLEANS','LA',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='MA- MASSACHUSETTS','MA',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='MASSACHUSETTS','MA',

iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='N.Y.','NY',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='NY - NEW YORK','NY',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='NY- NEW YORK','NY',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='NEW YORK','NY',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='OHIO','OH',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='OHIO (OH)','OH',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='OKLAHOMA','OK',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='OR OREGON','OR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='OREGON','OR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='PENNSYLVANIA','PA',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='P. R.','PR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='P.R','PR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='P.R.','PR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='P.R. PUERTO RICO','PR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='PR - PUERTO RICO','PR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='PUERTO RICO','PR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='PUERTORICO','PR',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='PALAU','PW',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='RHODE ISLAND','RI',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='SOUTH CAROLINA','SC',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='SOUTH DAKOTA','SD',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='TENNESSEE','TN',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='TEXAS','TX',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='TX-TEXAS','TX',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='U.T','UT',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='UTAH','UT',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='VIRGINIA','VA',
iif({provider business practice location address state name}=='VIRGIN ISLANDS','VI',

{provider business practice location address state name}

		{provider business mailing address state name} = iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='ALASKA','AK',
iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='ALABAMA','AL',
iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='ARKANSAS','AR',

iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='NC - NORTH CAROLINA','NC',
iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='NORTH CAROLINA','NC',
iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='NORTH CAROLINA (NC)','NC',
iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='NORTH DAKOTA','ND',

iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='NY - NEW YORK','NY',

iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='UTAH','UT',
iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='VIRGINIA','VA',
iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='VIRGIN ISLANDS','VI',
iif({provider business mailing address state name}=='VERMONT','VT',

{provider business mailing address state name}
))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))) ~> AddtlColumns
IdentifyPrimaryTaxonomy select(mapColumn(
		temp_npi = npi,
		{healthcare provider primary taxonomy code} = healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code,
		{healthcare provider primary group taxonomy} = healthcare_provider_group_taxonomy,
		{provider primary license number} = provider_license_number,
		{provider primary license number state code} = provider_license_number_state_code,
		primary_taxonomy_grouping = taxonomy_grouping,
		primary_taxonomy_classification = taxonomy_classification,
		primary_taxonomy_specialization = taxonomy_specialization
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
AppendPrimaryTaxonomy select(mapColumn(
		each(match(upper(name)!='TEMP_NPI'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
InputStateCorrection select(mapColumn(
		select5_npi = npi,
		address_line_1,
		address_line_2,
		city,
		postal_code,
		corrected_state
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
AddtlColumns, Select5 lookup(npi == select5_npi
	&& {provider first line business practice location address} == address_line_1
	&& {provider second line business practice location address} == address_line_2
	&& {provider business practice location address city name} == city
	&& {provider business practice location address postal code} == postal_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCorrectedStatePracAddr
LookupCorrectedCountryPracAddr derive({provider business practice location address state name} = iif(isNull(corrected_state), {provider business practice location address state name}, corrected_state),
		{provider business practice location address country code out us} = iif(isNull(corrected_country), {provider business practice location address country code out us}, corrected_country)) ~> DerivedColumn1
LookupCorrectedStatePracAddr, Select6 lookup(npi == select6_npi
	&& {provider first line business practice location address} == Select6@address_line_1
	&& {provider second line business practice location address} == Select6@address_line_2
	&& {provider business practice location address city name} == Select6@city
	&& {provider business practice location address postal code} == Select6@postal_code
	&& {provider business practice location address state name} == state,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCorrectedCountryPracAddr
InputCountryCorrection select(mapColumn(
		select6_npi = npi,
		address_line_1,
		address_line_2,
		city,
		state,
		postal_code,
		corrected_country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['select5_npi','select6_npi','address_line_1','address_line_2','city','postal_code','state','corrected_state','corrected_country'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select7, Select5 lookup(npi == select5_npi
	&& {provider first line business mailing address} == address_line_1
	&& {provider second line business mailing address} == address_line_2
	&& {provider business mailing address city name} == city
	&& {provider business mailing address postal code} == postal_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCorrrectedStateMailAddr
LookupCorrrectedStateMailAddr, Select6 lookup(npi == select6_npi
	&& {provider first line business mailing address} == Select6@address_line_1
	&& {provider second line business mailing address} == Select6@address_line_2
	&& {provider business mailing address city name} == Select6@city
	&& {provider business mailing address postal code} == Select6@postal_code
	&& {provider business mailing address state name} == state,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCorrectedCountryMailAddr
LookupCorrectedCountryMailAddr derive({provider business mailing address state name} = iif(isNull(corrected_state), {provider business mailing address state name}, corrected_state),
		{provider business mailing address country code (if outside u.s.) } = iif(isNull(corrected_country), {provider business mailing address country code (if outside u.s.) }, corrected_country)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['select5_npi','select6_npi','address_line_1','address_line_2','city','postal_code','state','corrected_state','corrected_country'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select8
NPPESProviderMain select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!startsWith(upper(name),'HEALTHCARE PROVIDER TAXONOMY CODE_')&&!startsWith(upper(name),'PROVIDER LICENSE NUMBER_')&&!startsWith(upper(name),'PROVIDER LICENSE NUMBER STATE CODE_')&&!startsWith(upper(name),'HEALTHCARE PROVIDER PRIMARY TAXONOMY SWITCH_')&&!startsWith(upper(name),'HEALTHCARE PROVIDER TAXONOMY GROUP_')))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select9
StageProviderTaxonomy aggregate(groupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		{healthcare provider primary taxonomy switch},
		{healthcare provider taxonomy code},
		{healthcare provider taxonomy group},
		{provider license number},
		{provider license number state code}),
	position = min(position)) ~> Aggregate1
Select1 select(mapColumn(
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		healthcare_provider_primary_taxonomy_switch,
		healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code,
		healthcare_provider_group_taxonomy,
		provider_license_number,
		provider_license_number_state_code,
		taxonomy_grouping,
		taxonomy_classification,
		taxonomy_specialization
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select10
StageOtherProvID aggregate(groupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		{other provider identifier},
		{other provider identifier type code},
		{other provider identifier state},
		{other provider identifier issuer}),
	temp = count(npi)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
